New Party Member: Sora

Area: Vænt's' Station

Landmark: Vænt's' Station

Dialogue: Vænt's greeting Sora's awakening

Goal: Select a weapon

Option 1: Path of the Warrior, Dream Sword

Option 2: Path of the Guardian, Dream Shield

Option 3: Path of the Mystic, Dream Staff

Cutscene: A Shadow appears out of Sora's shadow

Dialogue: Ventus warns Sora of the Shadow

Gimmick: Being reduced to 0 HP results in Cure being cast on him

Goal: Defeat the Shadow

Cutscene: a Door appears

Dialogue: Vanitas beckons Sora to open the Door to Darkness

Goal: Open the Door

Area: Destiny Islands Treehouse

Landmark: Destiny Islands Treehouse

Cutscene: Sora NPC appears

Goal: Speak to yourself

Sora: What is most important to you?

Cutscene: Sora splits into Riku, Kairi, and Vænt's as they walk to the three corners of the area

Goal: Speak to your friends

Riku: The bonds I forge with others

Kairi: Embarking on an incredible adventure

Vænt's: Protecting myself from danger
